articles.description: Amid Kohli's poor returns with the bat, Kapil, in a recent interview, opined that if a bowler with the pedigree of Ravichandran Ashwin could be dropped from the Test line-up then so can be Kohli.
articles.content: Former India captain Kapil Dev's remark on Virat Kohli created quite a stir in world cricket. Amid Kohli's poor returns with the bat, Kapil, in a recent interview, opined that if a bowler with the pe… [+2014 chars]

articles.title: World Test Championship race hots up following Sri Lanka victory - International Cricket Council
articles.description: Sri Lanka's stunning victory over Australia in the second Test in Galle has had major ramifications on the race for next year's World Test Championship final.
